definition: pomelo (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
pomelo (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Eat half a grapefruit twice a week.
I'll go and pick us some grapefruits .
The pomelos look good. Let's buy one.
sentences.chinese: 这柚子看起来不错，咱们买一个吧。

sentences.english: Americano canbe changed to Milktea, Fruit Honey Tea , Cold Lemon Cola.
sentences.chinese: 美式咖啡可换奶茶，蜂蜜柚子茶，冻柠乐。

sentences.english: And more than a grapefruit squirts.
Grapefruits are loaded with folate, found to significantly reduce the risk of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 柚子富含叶酸，研究表明可显著降低中风的危险。

sentences.english: Botanists believe that crosses between pomelo and wild orange created grapefruit.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家相信柚子和野生桔子的杂交产生了葡萄柚。

sentences.english: We have accepted your order No. 13E for tons of grapefruit.
sentences.chinese: 我方已接受你方第13E号订单订购的60吨柚子。
小孩们昨天吃了很多柚子。

sentences.english: Half a grapefruit has just 39 calories.
sentences.chinese: 半个柚子大约有39卡路里能量。

sentences.english: One is to avoid eating pomelo and drinking juice made from it.
sentences.chinese: 一个是避免吃柚子和和由它生产的果汁。

sentences.english: These are moon cakes and pomelos.
Peel the grapefruit, remove the film layer and only keep the inside flesh then tear into little pieces;
sentences.chinese: 大柚子去外皮后，再去掉瓣上的薄皮掰成小块。

sentences.english: Honey citron tea on weight loss so there is very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 所以蜂蜜柚子茶对减肥有是非常有帮助的。

sentences.english: My young brother likes to wear a pomelo hat on his head.
sentences.chinese: 我的弟弟喜欢在他的头上戴一顶柚子帽。
